entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
